pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, January 24, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an early learning and child care announcement virtually with Premier of Nunavut P.J. Akeeagok, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould, Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, and Nunavut Minister of Education Pamela Gross. A media availability will follow.

The event will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.cpac.ca

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 8203702#

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the virtual Cabinet retreat.

Closed to media
